name: Analyze Image
description: Analyze an image using Claude's vision capabilities. Provides detailed descriptions, identifies objects, text, people, scenes, and can answer specific questions about the image content.

image_source.description: Image source - can be a URL, base64 encoded image data, or file path

prompt.description: Optional specific question or instruction about what to analyze in the image. If not provided, returns a general description.
prompt.default: Describe this image in detail, including all visible objects, text, people, and the overall scene.

parameters.prompt: Describe this product, including its features, condition, and any visible text or labels.

examples.expected_result: Returns detailed analysis of the product image

parameters.prompt: List all objects visible in this room.

examples.expected_result: Returns a list of all identified objects
Returns general description of the image content
